question:
\(f(x) = \frac{2-x}{5}\)and \(g(x) = 3x - 2\). If \(f(g(x)) = 1\), what is the value of x?
(A) \(\frac{-5}{3}\)
(B) \(\frac{-1}{3}\)
(C) \(\frac{2}{3}\)
(D) 1
(E) \(\frac{5}{3}\)
